vocabName.langstring: Generic Study Mode for Course Data Programme. Created by Alan Paull, APS Ltd. This VDEX version 30 January 2012.

description.langstring: The provider has not supplied the information. [DEFAULT]
Could be full time or part time dependent on the learner.
The learning opportunity is the learner's main activity.

caption.langstring: Part of a full time programme

description.langstring: The learning opportunity is a component of a set of learning opportunities that form the learner's main activity.
The learning opportunity is not the learner's main activity
